page.title: 11Conservation: A Local View
page.content: Mr Fred Hunt of Immingham is an amateur naturalist who has taken a keen interest in{conservation.}Living and working in the area for many years he has observed wildlife. His record of the variety of species is impressive but he{fears for the future of nature in the area. A list of once common species now absent or under threat include;{Badger(seven killed {this year)Vole, Shrew,Red Squirrel {(once found in Burkingshaws Covert) {Corn Mouse,Frog,Toad,Swan.} Fred accepts the need for progress but would like to see more concern given to ecology. Different{habitats {could be protected}and money spent on reducing the damage to the environment would be well spent.New developments like underground gas stores can be set up with attempts to minimize damage to the environment.
